title: TESTING Arabic to English (Please point out any errors in translation in the comments section)
transcript: Peace and blessings of Allah be upon you. After we studied the biography of the best of Allah's creation, peace and blessings of Allah be upon him, in the first chapter, we will study with you in this chapter, the second chapter, a beautiful and beautiful knowledge, which revolves and revolves around the Prophet, peace and blessings of Allah be upon him. The knowledge of the characteristics of the Chosen One, the characteristics of the Prophet, peace and blessings of Allah be upon him. Everything that relates to the Prophet, peace and blessings of Allah be upon him, from the description of his character, his appearance, his body, his morals, his way of dressing, his colors, his hair, his shoes, how he used to walk, how he used to sit, how he used to sleep, peace and blessings of Allah be upon him. The knowledge of the things related to him, like his sweat, how he used to eat, his clothes, his sleep, his relationship with his wives, peace and blessings of Allah be upon him, his visits, all these things are related to him, peace and blessings of Allah be upon him. The knowledge of the characteristics is different from the biography, because the biography is a general subject, like the interpretation of the Holy Quran, the subject of interpretation is general, but the knowledge of the reasons for the revelation is a special knowledge, which combines the knowledge of interpretation with these differences. The knowledge of Mohammed the Chosen one, peace and blessings of Allah be upon him, So that you may have a description of the Prophet (peace and blessings of Allah be upon him) as though you could see him as his love for his Lord is charted in your heart. And your knowledge increases when you get to know him, May Allah send salutations upon him and his family. you will know his names. The Prophet, peace and blessings be upon him, has many names. All of these things will bring you closer to the Prophet, peace and blessings be upon him, on the Day of Resurrection to increase your love for him. So, I ask Allah, Almighty, to help me and you to study this noble, beautiful, and noble knowledge, which is the most noble of Allah's creation, peace and blessings be upon him and his family.
